Name: Rainbow Heights Academy: Year 1
About the game: You are the newest member of the AGG book club. Members of this book club are known to read the latest and most riveting books that they can get their hands on They soon stumble across a strange book called 'The Fractured Oath' The book synopsis reads... 'When Tyler Lee decides to risk it all to get the once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to attend the most prestigious school in the country, He soon realizes that he may have bitten off more than he could chew. Whether he rises to the challenge or accepts defeat, That'll be solely up to you!' Actions have consequences in this Choose-Your-Own-Adventure Visual Novel! Play as a member of a book club that uncovers the mysteries behind a strange book Meet a cast of lively characters as you delve deeper into the story Gain stats and pass skill check events to achieve desired story outcomes - Genre: Drama/Slice of Life/Dating Sim Writer/Programmer: Ory Dubenion, Peta Clarke Composer: Composer Squad Sound Effects: freesound Art: Uncle Mugen, Peta Clarke -
